name: Rolling Unicorns
description:
First law of the Universe:
The planets move around stars because they are being pulled by the unicorns.

Second law of the Universe:
When a planet consumes a crystal, it gets bigger.

Third law of the Universe:
If a planet becomes bigger than its star system, it consumes the system and explodes.

------------------

You are a unicorn pulling a planet. Your goal is to make it as huge as possible. The bigger it is, the more it obstructs the vision. Thankfully, it's also easier to hit crystals with such massive planet. Up to a point where you're able to consume everything...

Remember, it's the planet that needs to collect the crystals, not your unicorn.
(The unicorns don't grow, why would they want to consume crystals?)

Controls:

Player 0 (bottom):
Vertical movement - Up/Down Arrows or Keypad 8/5
Turn left/right - Left/Right Arrows or Keypad 4/6
Boost - Keypad Enter or Right Control

Player 1 (top):
Vertical movement - W/S
Turn left/right - A/D
Boost - Space

Back to menu - Escape

------------------

Created in Unity for Space Jam III
